description: Help the environment by planting a tree in your backyard or a local park.
impact: Trees absorb carbon dioxide and provide oxygen.

description: Set up a recycling station at home to sort out recyclables like paper, plastic, and glass.
impact: Recycling reduces waste and saves energy.

description: Instead of driving, walk or ride your bike to school to reduce carbon emissions.
Create a bird feeder using recycled materials to help local wildlife.
impact: Supports local birds and promotes biodiversity.

description: Gather friends and family to clean up a local park or beach.
impact: Keeps the environment clean and safe for everyone.
